paper_abstract: The RosettaNet is an e-commerce standard over the Internet and Grid is a computing infrastructure for resource sharing. How to build e-commerce applications based on the RosettaNet over the Grid infrastructure is what we are interested in this paper. We first introduce the RosettaNet and discuss the security strategy of the RosettaNet. Then, we look into the security issues of the Grid. Finally, we present how the security of RosettaNet can be improved, particularly, in the Grid environment. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V All rights reserved.
paper_title: The security analyses of RosettaNet in Grid
